item.title: Europe markets close higher following volatile week; Anglo American up 5.4%
item.description: European stocks closed higher Friday afternoon, following a mixed morning session as investors assessed the latest euro zone inflation data.

item.title: S&P 500 rises to new high in Friday's short session, Dow heads for best month of 2024: Live updates
item.description: The three major indexes are on track to end November notably higher.

item.title: British lawmakers give initial support to assisted dying bill
item.description: When the result of the vote was announced some people hugged and cheered. Some shouted: "Yes!" Others said: "We have done it" and "Thank you".

item.title: Swiss wealth manager Lombard Odier indicted on money laundering charges
item.description: Lombard Odier — one of Switzerland's oldest private banks — has been indicted by Swiss prosecutors on charges of aggravated money laundering.

item.title: Bank of England warns of risks from rise in global trade barriers
item.description: While U.K. households, businesses and banks appeared to be in good shape, the BoE report said, Britain's financial sector faced risks that were "parti...
